revision.comment: Update Details from on hand example
revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=EnGenius |model=EPG600 |upc=655216007031 |asin=B00O1B0Q6M |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=Senao |est_release_date=09/2014 |fcc_date=01/06/2014 |fcc_id=A8J-EPG600 |pcb_id=7016A0758004 |type=wireless router, analog phone gateway |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7620A;MT7620A, 1318-BMTH, CTPPJ706; |cpu1_cspeed=580 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L12845EMI-10G |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5TU32M16DG-AC |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7620A;MT7620A, 1318-BMTH, CTPPJ706; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi2_chip1_model=RT5592 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8337N;QCA8337N-AL3C, EP1467.3B, 1307, TAIWAN; |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=VoIP chip w/ SPI interface;Silicon Labs;Si3050;Si3050-FT, 1235EM, F127;1;,,, VoIP line side device;Silicon Labs;Si3019;3019-FT, 1311FF, L0PL;1;,,, 23V, 3A Synchronous Step-Down DC/DC Converter;ITE Tech;IT7663M;;1;,,, |flags=analog phone port, SNMP, |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid=EnGeniusXXXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^EnGenius[A-F0-9]{6}$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=88:DC:96 |oui_eth=88:DC:96 }} {{TagLine|Wireless Dual Band VoIP Router}}
"EPG600-0.20 LFP" is silkscrened on the board in the FCC photos.
Default settings are per the FCC manual, default SSIDs ('''EnGeniusXXXXXX''' for both bands, 5G = 2.4 MAC + 1) + the 88:DC:96 OUI are per the FCC sample label. They may be inaccurate.
==Probable PSUs== The power supply shown in the FCC photos is a '''Shenzhen Gongjin Electronics''' S24B12-120A125-04.
{{hasPowerSupply |brand=Shenzhen Gongjin Electronics |model=S24B12-120A125-04 |manuf_country=China |input_v=100-240 |input_a=0.7 |input_c=AC |input_hz=50/60 |input_conn=NEMA 1-15P |output_v=12 |output_a=1.25 |output_c=DC |output_conn=barrel |style=large, vertical }}
==Images== <gallery> File:EnGenius EPG600.jpeg|Board Top </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]] ----
